member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData
member.summary: Base properties for all types of HTML notifications.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Title
member.summary: The title of the notification as specified in the first parameter of the constructor.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Badge
member.summary: The URL of the image used to represent the notification when there is not enough space to display the notification itself.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Body
member.summary: The body string of the notification as specified in the constructor's options parameter.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Data
member.summary: The data read-only property of the Notification interface returns a structured clone of the notification's data, as specified in the data option of the Notification() constructor. The notification's data can be any arbitrary data that you want associated with the notification.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Dir
member.summary: The text direction of the notification as specified in the constructor's options parameter.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Lang
member.summary: The language code of the notification as specified in the constructor's options parameter.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Tag
member.summary: The ID of the notification (if any) as specified in the constructor's options parameter.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Icon
member.summary: The URL of the image used as an icon of the notification as specified in the constructor's options parameter.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Image
member.summary: The URL of an image to be displayed as part of the notification, as specified in the constructor's options parameter.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Renotify
member.summary: Specifies whether the user should be notified after a new notification replaces an old one.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.RequireInteraction
member.summary: A Boolean indicating that a notification should remain active until the user clicks or dismisses it, rather than closing automatically.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Silent
member.summary: Specifies whether the notification should be silent â€” i.e., no sounds or vibrations should be issued, regardless of the device settings.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Timestamp
member.summary: Specifies the time at which a notification is created or applicable (past, present, or future).

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.Vibrate
member.summary: Specifies a vibration pattern for devices with vibration hardware to emit. An array of values describes alternating periods in which the device is vibrating and not vibrating.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationData.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationEventInfo
member.summary: Html5 Notification Permission Request result event info to handle JS callback

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationOptions
member.summary: These properties are available only on instances of the `Notification` object.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationOptions.OnClickCallback
member.summary: Callback method for Notification Click event.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationOptions.OnOpenCallback
member.summary: Callback method for Notification Open event.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationOptions.OnCloseCallback
member.summary: Callback method for Notification Close event.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationOptions.OnErrorCallback
member.summary: Callback method for Notification on Error event.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationOptions.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationPermissionRequestEventInfo
member.summary: Html5 Notification Permission Request result event info to handle JS callback

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationPermissionTypes
member.summary: A string representing the current permission to display notifications.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationPermissionTypes.Default
member.summary: The user choice is unknown and therefore the browser will act as if the value were denied.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationPermissionTypes.Denied
member.summary: The user refuses to have notifications displayed.

member.name: F:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationPermissionTypes.Granted
member.summary: The user accepts having notifications displayed.

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationService
member.summary: Implementation of

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlServiceWorkerNotificationOptions
member.summary: These properties are available for Service worker `Notification`.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlServiceWorkerNotificationOptions.Actions
member.summary: The actions array of the Notification as specified in the constructor's options parameter.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlServiceWorkerNotificationOptions.ServiceWorkerUrl
member.summary: Service worker must be registered to show Notifications with Actions. Service worker need a JS file to be registered.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlServiceWorkerNotificationOptions.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Default constructor.
member.param: To handle Notification action a ServiceWorker must be registered with and URL to a JS file

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.IHtmlNotificationService
member.summary: Injectable service to handle Browser/HML5 notifications. Docs: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/notification Settings on Windows: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51907779/browser-notification-not-showing-up#58982697

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.IHtmlNotificationService.RequestPermissionAsync(System.Func{Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationPermissionTypes,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Prompts User Consent permission request popup to the User to decide whether to allow Notifications or not.
member.param: Callback function to call when User consent result provided

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.IHtmlNotificationService.CheckPermissionAsync
member.summary: Checks the Notification User Consent status.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.IHtmlNotificationService.CheckMaxActionsAsync
member.summary: Returns maxActions attribute of the Notification interface returns the maximum number of actions supported by the device and the User Agent.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.IHtmlNotificationService.IsBrowserSupportedAsync
member.summary: Checks if Browser supports Notification or not.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.IHtmlNotificationService.ShowsAsync(Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlNotificationOptions)
member.summary: Shows a Notification with the given options data.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.IHtmlNotificationService.ShowsWithActionsAsync(Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.HtmlServiceWorkerNotificationOptions)
member.summary: Registers the given ServiceWorker from the URL and prompts Notifications with Options provided. ServiceWorker can handle Custom events with custom data provided.
member.param: data type required for ServiceWorker Notifications

member.name: T:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.NotificationAction
member.summary: The NotificationAction interface of the Notifications API is used to represent action buttons the user can click to interact with notifications. These buttons' appearance and specific functionality vary across platforms but generally they provide a way to asynchronously show actions to the user in a notification.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.NotificationAction.Action
member.summary: The name of the action, which can be used to identify the clicked action similar to input names.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.NotificationAction.Title
member.summary: The string describing the action that is displayed to the user.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Notifications.NotificationAction.Icon
member.summary: The URL of the image used to represent the notification when there is not enough space to display the notification itself.

member.summary: Extension methods to register required Notification services into IServiceCollection

member.summary: Registers required Notification services into IServiceCollection
